basics.name: Subha Ilamathy
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced AI Engineer specialized in LLMs, Vector Search, Deep Learning, Computer Vision

work.name: University of Illinois Chicago
work.summary: Led development of Conversational AI for image editing using Generative AI and MERN-Django stack.

work.name: Zoho Corporation
work.summary: Built GPT-4 RAG diagnostic agents, ASR optimization with TVM, semantic search with FAISS, and scalable ML APIs.

work.name: MulticoreWare Inc.
work.summary: Developed edge-ready multimodal AI systems for gesture recognition and object detection using transformers.

projects.name: DeepSeek Lite Optimization
projects.summary: Quantized DeepSeek-R1 using SmoothQuant + QuantizationModifier, achieving 2× speedup with minimal accuracy loss.

projects.name: AI Research Agent
projects.summary: Implemented a Conversational AI Research Assistant powered by LLM and Graph-RAG for research paper retrieval and generation.
highlights: 10k+ nodes and edges in Knowledge Graph

projects.name: Pinterest Link Prediction
projects.summary: Developed a multimodal GNN-based ranking model aligning Graph, Visual, and Text features for link prediction on Pinterest.
highlights: Natural language supervision with contrastive learning

projects.name: Real-time Person Tracking System
projects.summary: Crime detection system using Computer Vision and Django REST APIs; optimized LSTM model for edge inference.
highlights: Deployed with AWS EC2, Kafka, Django

publications.name: Temporal Causal Discovery in Complex HPC Network Simulations
publications.summary: Accepted at GCASR 2025 Greater Chicago Area Systems Research Poster Session. Explores temporal causal discovery frameworks in high-performance computing simulations.

publications.name: DeepSeek Lite: Optimizing DeepSeek R1
publications.summary: A comparative study on quantization and inference acceleration of the DeepSeek-R1 model.

publications.name: Hardware Accelerated FIM Techniques
publications.summary: Investigates fast image manipulation techniques using hardware-accelerated architectures.

publications.name: Multimodal Node Embeddings for Link Prediction on Pinterest
publications.summary: Uses GNN and visual-text embeddings to improve link prediction performance on Pinterest’s dataset.

publications.name: Real-Time Suspicious Human Action Recognition
publications.publisher: Journal of Computational and Theoretical Nanoscience (JCTN)
publications.summary: Presents a real-time human action recognition system for surveillance on resource-constrained edge devices. Scopus Indexed.
